import os
import sqlite3
from pathlib import Path

DB_PATH = Path("todolist.db")

SCHEMA = """
PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task_type (
    type_id   INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    type_name TEXT    NOT NULL UNIQUE CHECK (length(type_name) <= 30)
);
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO task_type (type_name) VALUES ('Bug'), ('Idea');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
    status_id   INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    status_name TEXT    NOT NULL UNIQUE CHECK (length(status_name) <= 30)
);
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO status (status_name) VALUES
    ('New'), ('Open'), ('In Review'), ('Resolved'), ('Closed');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task (
    task_id      INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    title        TEXT    NOT NULL CHECK (length(title) <= 150),
    description  TEXT    NOT NULL,
    type_id      INTEGER NOT NULL,
    status_id    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    created_at   DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
    updated_at   DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
    CONSTRAINT fk_task_type
        FOREIGN KEY (type_id)
        REFERENCES task_type (type_id)
        ON DELETE RESTRICT
        ON UPDATE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_task_status
        FOREIGN KEY (status_id)
        REFERENCES status (status_id)
        ON DELETE RESTRICT
        ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
"""

def get_connection() -> sqlite3.Connection:
    """√ñffnet (bzw. erstellt) die SQLite‚ÄëDatenbank und sorgt f√ºr das Schema."""
    conn = sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH)
    conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
    conn.executescript(SCHEMA)
    conn.commit()
    return conn

### FILENAME: app/models.py
from dataclasses import dataclass
from typing import List
import sqlite3
from .database import get_connection

@dataclass
class Task:
    task_id: int
    title: str
    description: str
    type_name: str
    status_name: str

def fetch_all_tasks() -> List[Task]:
    """Liest alle Tasks aus der DB und gibt sie als Liste von Task‚ÄëObjekten zur√ºck."""
    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute("""
        SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.description,
               tt.type_name, s.status_name
        FROM task t
        JOIN task_type tt ON t.type_id = tt.type_id
        JOIN status s ON t.status_id = s.status_id
        ORDER BY t.task_id ASC;
    """)
    rows = cur.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return [Task(row["task_id"], row["title"], row["description"],
                 row["type_name"], row["status_name"]) for row in rows]

def insert_task(title: str, description: str, type_name: str = "Bug", status_name: str = "New") -> int:
    """F√ºgt einen neuen Task ein und gibt die neue task_id zur√ºck."""
    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute("SELECT type_id FROM task_type WHERE type_name = ?", (type_name,))
    type_id = cur.fetchone()["type_id"]
    cur.execute("SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_name = ?", (status_name,))
    status_id = cur.fetchone()["status_id"]
    cur.execute("""
        INSERT INTO task (title, description, type_id, status_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
    """, (title, description, type_id, status_id))
    conn.commit()
    task_id = cur.lastrowid
    conn.close()
    return task_id

def update_task_status(task_id: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
    """√Ñndert den Status eines Tasks und schreibt die Historie."""
    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()
    # Aktuellen Status holen
    cur.execute("SELECT status_id FROM task WHERE task_id = ?", (task_id,))
    old_status_id = cur.fetchone()["status_id"]
    # Neue Status‚ÄëID ermitteln
    cur.execute("SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_name = ?", (new_status_name,))
    new_status_id = cur.fetchone()["status_id"]
    # Update
    cur.execute("""
        UPDATE task
        SET status_id = ?, updated_at = datetime('now')
        WHERE task_id = ?;
    """, (new_status_id, task_id))
    # Historie‚ÄëEintrag
    cur.execute("""
        INSERT INTO task_history (task_id, old_status_id, new_status_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?);
    """, (task_id, old_status_id, new_status_id))
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

import sys
from typing import List
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt, QSize
from PyQt5.QtGui import QIcon, QFont
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QMainWindow, QWidget, QVBoxLayout, QHBoxLayout,
    QTableWidget, QTableWidgetItem, QPushButton,
    QComboBox, QHeaderView, QMessageBox, QLineEdit, QLabel, QDialog, QTextEdit
)
from .models import Task, fetch_all_tasks, insert_task, update_task_status

class AddTaskDialog(QDialog):
    """Ein einfacher Dialog zum Anlegen eines neuen Tasks."""
    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle("Neuen Bug / Idee hinzuf√ºgen")
        self.setModal(True)
        self.resize(400, 300)

        layout = QVBoxLayout(self)

        self.title_edit = QLineEdit(self)
        self.title_edit.setPlaceholderText("Titel (max. 150 Zeichen)")
        layout.addWidget(QLabel("Titel:"))
        layout.addWidget(self.title_edit)

        self.desc_edit = QTextEdit(self)
        self.desc_edit.setPlaceholderText("Beschreibung")
        layout.addWidget(QLabel("Beschreibung:"))
        layout.addWidget(self.desc_edit)

        btn_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.btn_ok = QPushButton("Erstellen", self)
        self.btn_cancel = QPushButton("Abbrechen", self)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.btn_ok)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.btn_cancel)
        layout.addLayout(btn_layout)

        self.btn_ok.clicked.connect(self.accept)
        self.btn_cancel.clicked.connect(self.reject)

    def get_data(self):
        return self.title_edit.text().strip(), self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip()

class MainWindow(QMainWindow):
    """Hauptfenster der Todo‚ÄëListe‚ÄëApp."""
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.setWindowTitle("Bug‚Äë & Ideen‚ÄëTracker")
        self.setMinimumSize(QSize(800, 600))
        self.setWindowIcon(QIcon())

        central = QWidget(self)
        self.setCentralWidget(central)

        main_layout = QVBoxLayout(central)

        # Toolbar‚Äë√§hnliche Zeile
        toolbar = QHBoxLayout()
        self.btn_add = QPushButton("‚ûï Neuer Eintrag", self)
        toolbar.addWidget(self.btn_add)
        toolbar.addStretch()
        main_layout.addLayout(toolbar)

        # Tabelle
        self.table = QTableWidget(self)
        self.table.setColumnCount(5)
        self.table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(["NR", "Name", "Beschreibung", "Typ", "Status"])
        self.table.horizontalHeader().setSectionResizeMode(QHeaderView.Stretch)
        self.table.verticalHeader().setVisible(False)
        self.table.setEditTriggers(QTableWidget.NoEditTriggers)
        self.table.setSelectionBehavior(QTableWidget.SelectRows)
        self.table.setAlternatingRowColors(True)
        main_layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Signale
        self.btn_add.clicked.connect(self.show_add_dialog)
        self.table.cellChanged.connect(self.handle_cell_changed)

        # Daten laden
        self.load_tasks()

    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    # Daten‚ÄëHandling
    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    def load_tasks(self) -> None:
        """L√§dt alle Tasks aus der DB und f√ºllt die Tabelle."""
        self.table.blockSignals(True)  # Verhindere rekursive Aufrufe
        self.table.setRowCount(0)
        tasks: List[Task] = fetch_all_tasks()
        for task in tasks:
            self._add_task_to_table(task)
        self.table.blockSignals(False)

    def _add_task_to_table(self, task: Task) -> None:
        row = self.table.rowCount()
        self.table.insertRow(row)

        # NR (read‚Äëonly)
        nr_item = QTableWidgetItem(str(task.task_id))
        nr_item.setFlags(nr_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 0, nr_item)

        # Name
        name_item = QTableWidgetItem(task.title)
        name_item.setFlags(name_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 1, name_item)

        # Beschreibung (mehrzeilig)
        desc_item = QTableWidgetItem(task.description)
        desc_item.setFlags(desc_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 2, desc_item)

        # Typ (read‚Äëonly)
        type_item = QTableWidgetItem(task.type_name)
        type_item.setFlags(type_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 3, type_item)

        # Status (ComboBox)
        status_cb = QComboBox(self)
        status_cb.addItems(["New", "Open", "In Review", "Resolved", "Closed"])
        idx = status_cb.findText(task.status_name)
        if idx >= 0:
            status_cb.setCurrentIndex(idx)
        self.table.setCellWidget(row, 4, status_cb)
        status_cb.currentIndexChanged.connect(lambda _, r=row: self._status_changed(r))

    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    # UI‚ÄëAktionen
    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    def show_add_dialog(self) -> None:
        dlg = AddTaskDialog(self)
        if dlg.exec_() == QDialog.Accepted:
            title, description = dlg.get_data()
            if not title:
                QMessageBox.warning(self, "Ung√ºltig", "Der Titel darf nicht leer sein.")
                return
            task_id = insert_task(title, description, type_name="Bug", status_name="New")
            new_task = Task(task_id, title, description, "Bug", "New")
            self._add_task_to_table(new_task)

    def _status_changed(self, row: int) -> None:
        """Wird aufgerufen, wenn der Nutzer den Status einer Zeile √§ndert."""
        task_id_item = self.table.item(row, 0)
        if not task_id_item:
            return
        task_id = int(task_id_item.text())
        combo: QComboBox = self.table.cellWidget(row, 4)  # type: ignore
        new_status = combo.currentText()
        try:
            update_task_status(task_id, new_status)
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Fehler", f"Status konnte nicht gespeichert werden:\n{e}")

    def handle_cell_changed(self, row: int, column: int) -> None:
        """Placeholder ‚Äì aktuell werden keine Zellen editierbar gemacht."""
        pass

from app.main_window import MainWindow

@pytest.fixture
def main_window(qapp, qtbot):

def test_window_exists(main_window):
    """Das Hauptfenster muss ein QMainWindow sein und sichtbar."""
    assert isinstance(main_window, QMainWindow)

import sqlite3
from pathlib import Path

DB_PATH = Path("todolist.db")

SCHEMA = """
PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON;

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------
-- Referenz‚ÄëTabellen
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task_type (
    type_id   INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    type_name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE CHECK (length(type_name) <= 30)
);
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO task_type (type_name) VALUES ('Bug'), ('Idea');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
    status_id   INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    status_name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE CHECK (length(status_name) <= 30)
);
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO status (status_name) VALUES
    ('New'), ('Open'), ('In Review'), ('Resolved'), ('Closed');

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------
-- Kern‚ÄëTabelle
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task (
    task_id      INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    title        TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (length(title) <= 150),
    description  TEXT NOT NULL,
    type_id      INTEGER NOT NULL,
    status_id    INTEGER NOT NULL,
    created_at   DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
    updated_at   DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
    CONSTRAINT fk_task_type
        FOREIGN KEY (type_id) REFERENCES task_type (type_id)
        ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_task_status
        FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status (status_id)
        ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE
);

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------
-- Historie‚ÄëTabelle (optional)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS task_history (
    history_id   INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    task_id      INTEGER NOT NULL,
    old_status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    new_status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    changed_at   DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
    CONSTRAINT fk_hist_task
        FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES task (task_id)
        ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_hist_old_status
        FOREIGN KEY (old_status_id) REFERENCES status (status_id)
        ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_hist_new_status
        FOREIGN KEY (new_status_id) REFERENCES status (status_id)
        ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE
);
"""

def get_connection() -> sqlite3.Connection:
    """√ñffnet (bzw. erstellt) die SQLite‚ÄëDatenbank und sorgt f√ºr das Schema."""
    conn = sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH)
    conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
    conn.executescript(SCHEMA)
    conn.commit()
    return conn

### FILENAME: app/models.py
from dataclasses import dataclass
from typing import List
import sqlite3
from .database import get_connection

@dataclass
class Task:
    task_id: int
    title: str
    description: str
    type_name: str
    status_name: str

def fetch_all_tasks() -> List[Task]:
    """Liest alle Tasks aus der DB und gibt sie als Liste von Task‚ÄëObjekten zur√ºck."""
    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute("""
        SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.description,
               tt.type_name, s.status_name
        FROM task t
        JOIN task_type tt ON t.type_id = tt.type_id
        JOIN status s ON t.status_id = s.status_id
        ORDER BY t.task_id ASC;
    """)
    rows = cur.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return [
        Task(
            task_id=row["task_id"],
            title=row["title"],
            description=row["description"],
            type_name=row["type_name"],
            status_name=row["status_name"]
        )
        for row in rows
    ]

def insert_task(title: str, description: str, type_name: str = "Bug", status_name: str = "New") -> int:
    """F√ºgt einen neuen Task ein und gibt die neue task_id zur√ºck."""
    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute("SELECT type_id FROM task_type WHERE type_name = ?", (type_name,))
    type_row = cur.fetchone()
    if not type_row:
        raise ValueError(f"Unbekannter Typ: {type_name}")
    type_id = type_row["type_id"]

    cur.execute("SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_name = ?", (status_name,))
    status_row = cur.fetchone()
    if not status_row:
        raise ValueError(f"Unbekannter Status: {status_name}")
    status_id = status_row["status_id"]

    cur.execute(
        """
        INSERT INTO task (title, description, type_id, status_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
        """,
        (title, description, type_id, status_id)
    )
    task_id = cur.lastrowid
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    return task_id

def update_task_status(task_id: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
    """√Ñndert den Status eines Tasks und schreibt die Historie."""
    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()

    # Aktuellen Status holen
    cur.execute("SELECT status_id FROM task WHERE task_id = ?", (task_id,))
    old_row = cur.fetchone()
    if not old_row:
        conn.close()
        raise ValueError(f"Task mit ID {task_id} nicht gefunden")
    old_status_id = old_row["status_id"]

    # Neue Status‚ÄëID ermitteln
    cur.execute("SELECT status_id FROM status WHERE status_name = ?", (new_status_name,))
    new_row = cur.fetchone()
    if not new_row:
        conn.close()
        raise ValueError(f"Unbekannter neuer Status: {new_status_name}")
    new_status_id = new_row["status_id"]

    # Update
    cur.execute(
        """
        UPDATE task
        SET status_id = ?, updated_at = datetime('now')
        WHERE task_id = ?;
        """,
        (new_status_id, task_id)
    )

    # Historie‚ÄëEintrag
    cur.execute(
        """
        INSERT INTO task_history (task_id, old_status_id, new_status_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?);
        """,
        (task_id, old_status_id, new_status_id)
    )

    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

import sys
from typing import List
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt, QSize
from PyQt5.QtGui import QIcon
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QMainWindow, QWidget, QVBoxLayout, QHBoxLayout,
    QTableWidget, QTableWidgetItem, QPushButton,
    QComboBox, QHeaderView, QMessageBox, QLineEdit,
    QLabel, QDialog, QTextEdit
)
from .models import Task, fetch_all_tasks, insert_task, update_task_status

class AddTaskDialog(QDialog):
    """Dialog zum Anlegen eines neuen Bugs / einer neuen Idee."""
    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle("Neuen Bug / Idee hinzuf√ºgen")
        self.setModal(True)
        self.resize(400, 300)

        layout = QVBoxLayout(self)

        self.title_edit = QLineEdit(self)
        self.title_edit.setPlaceholderText("Titel (max. 150 Zeichen)")
        layout.addWidget(QLabel("Titel:"))
        layout.addWidget(self.title_edit)

        self.desc_edit = QTextEdit(self)
        self.desc_edit.setPlaceholderText("Beschreibung")
        layout.addWidget(QLabel("Beschreibung:"))
        layout.addWidget(self.desc_edit)

        btn_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.btn_ok = QPushButton("Erstellen", self)
        self.btn_cancel = QPushButton("Abbrechen", self)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.btn_ok)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.btn_cancel)
        layout.addLayout(btn_layout)

        self.btn_ok.clicked.connect(self.accept)
        self.btn_cancel.clicked.connect(self.reject)

    def get_data(self):
        return self.title_edit.text().strip(), self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip()

class MainWindow(QMainWindow):
    """Hauptfenster der Todo‚ÄëListe‚ÄëApp."""
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.setWindowTitle("Bug‚Äë & Ideen‚ÄëTracker")
        self.setMinimumSize(QSize(800, 600))
        self.setWindowIcon(QIcon())

        central = QWidget(self)
        self.setCentralWidget(central)

        main_layout = QVBoxLayout(central)

        # Toolbar‚Äë√§hnliche Zeile
        toolbar = QHBoxLayout()
        self.btn_add = QPushButton("‚ûï Neuer Eintrag", self)
        toolbar.addWidget(self.btn_add)
        toolbar.addStretch()
        main_layout.addLayout(toolbar)

        # Tabelle
        self.table = QTableWidget(self)
        self.table.setColumnCount(5)
        self.table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(["NR", "Name", "Beschreibung", "Typ", "Status"])
        self.table.horizontalHeader().setSectionResizeMode(QHeaderView.Stretch)
        self.table.verticalHeader().setVisible(False)
        self.table.setEditTriggers(QTableWidget.NoEditTriggers)
        self.table.setSelectionBehavior(QTableWidget.SelectRows)
        self.table.setAlternatingRowColors(True)
        main_layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Signale
        self.btn_add.clicked.connect(self.show_add_dialog)
        self.table.cellChanged.connect(self.handle_cell_changed)

        # Daten laden
        self.load_tasks()

    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    # Daten‚ÄëHandling
    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    def load_tasks(self) -> None:
        """L√§dt alle Tasks aus der DB und f√ºllt die Tabelle."""
        self.table.blockSignals(True)  # Verhindert rekursive Aufrufe
        self.table.setRowCount(0)
        tasks: List[Task] = fetch_all_tasks()
        for task in tasks:
            self._add_task_to_table(task)
        self.table.blockSignals(False)

    def _add_task_to_table(self, task: Task) -> None:
        row = self.table.rowCount()
        self.table.insertRow(row)

        # NR (read‚Äëonly)
        nr_item = QTableWidgetItem(str(task.task_id))
        nr_item.setFlags(nr_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 0, nr_item)

        # Name
        name_item = QTableWidgetItem(task.title)
        name_item.setFlags(name_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 1, name_item)

        # Beschreibung
        desc_item = QTableWidgetItem(task.description)
        desc_item.setFlags(desc_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 2, desc_item)

        # Typ (read‚Äëonly)
        type_item = QTableWidgetItem(task.type_name)
        type_item.setFlags(type_item.flags() ^ Qt.ItemIsEditable)
        self.table.setItem(row, 3, type_item)

        # Status (ComboBox)
        status_cb = QComboBox(self)
        status_cb.addItems(["New", "Open", "In Review", "Resolved", "Closed"])
        idx = status_cb.findText(task.status_name)
        if idx >= 0:
            status_cb.setCurrentIndex(idx)
        self.table.setCellWidget(row, 4, status_cb)
        # Lambda bindet die aktuelle Zeile
        status_cb.currentIndexChanged.connect(lambda _, r=row: self._status_changed(r))

    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    # UI‚ÄëAktionen
    # -----------------------------------------------------------------
    def show_add_dialog(self) -> None:
        dlg = AddTaskDialog(self)
        if dlg.exec_() == QDialog.Accepted:
            title, description = dlg.get_data()
            if not title:
                QMessageBox.warning(self, "Ung√ºltig", "Der Titel darf nicht leer sein.")
                return
            task_id = insert_task(title, description, type_name="Bug", status_name="New")
            new_task = Task(task_id, title, description, "Bug", "New")
            self._add_task_to_table(new_task)

    def _status_changed(self, row: int) -> None:
        """Wird aufgerufen, wenn der Nutzer den Status einer Zeile √§ndert."""
        task_id_item = self.table.item(row, 0)
        if not task_id_item:
            return
        task_id = int(task_id_item.text())
        combo: QComboBox = self.table.cellWidget(row, 4)  # type: ignore
        new_status = combo.currentText()
        try:
            update_task_status(task_id, new_status)
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Fehler", f"Status konnte nicht gespeichert werden:\n{e}")

    def handle_cell_changed(self, row: int, column: int) -> None:
        """Placeholder ‚Äì aktuell werden keine Zellen editierbar gemacht."""
        pass
